amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment SA 617 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 617 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 35 - 65. Record Vote Number: 160.
